sentences.sContent: About 160 species of rare birds live in the swamps and prairie there.
sentences.sContent_eng: About 160 species of rare birds live in the swamps and prairie there.
sentences.sCn: 大约有160种珍稀鸟类栖息在这里的沼泽地和大草原上。

sentences.sContent: How many an afternoon antinia and i have trailed along the prairie under the magnificence .
sentences.sContent_eng: How many an afternoon antinia and i have trailed along the prairie under the magnificence .
sentences.sCn: 有多少个下午，我同安东妮亚在大草原上这种壮丽的景色中慢慢地走着啊！

sentences.sContent: From your English garden variety to your prairie wildflower, floral prints tell a sweet story.
sentences.sContent_eng: From your English garden variety to your prairie wildflower, floral prints tell a sweet story.
sentences.sCn: 从英式花园的百花齐放到大草原的野花儿，印花叙述着甜美的故事。

remMethod.val: pr + air(空气) + ie → 大草原上空气好

trans.tranOther: a wide open area of fairly flat land in North America which is covered in grass or wheat
